summary: Iteration 17 - Dashboard Stabilization & Yakında Temizliği regression test PASS. All 15 backend tests passed. Dashboard summary endpoint returns kpis/trends/risk_panel. KPI cards are clickable and navigate to correct URLs. Menu Management API disabled (403). CSV-only import/export verified.

issues: Minor React hydration warning in console about <span> inside <select>/<option> - does not affect functionality (known from iteration 16)

critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard summary endpoint returns full schema: kpis.today, kpis.last_7_days, trends.listings, risk_panel (suspicious_logins, sla_breaches, pending_payments)
Dashboard KPI cards are clickable Link components navigating to correct URLs
Frontend displays error state gracefully when dashboard data unavailable
Menu Management API disabled - all endpoints (GET/POST/PATCH/DELETE) return 403 + feature_disabled
Category import/export: CSV endpoints work (200), XLSX endpoints disabled (403 + feature_disabled)
Menu Management NOT present in sidebar navigation
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard stabilization complete. Yakında Temizliği features verified (Menu Management disabled, CSV-only import/export). All KPI links working correctly.
